plays.text: Penalty to Mark Hartigan 2 minutes for Elbowing Eric Weinrich
Goal scored by Dean McAmmond assisted by Doug Weight AND Jamal Mayers
Penalty to Jaroslav Balastik 2 minutes for High Sticking Steve Poapst
Penalty to Christian Backman 2 minutes for Hooking Sergei Fedorov
Penalty to Bryan Berard 2 minutes for Hooking Mark Rycroft
Penalty to Kevin Dallman 2 minutes for Hooking Dan Fritsche
Goal scored by Nikolai Zherdev unassisted
Penalty to Petr Cajanek 2 minutes for High Sticking Steven Goertzen
Goal scored by Mike Sillinger assisted by Dallas Drake
Penalty to Mark Hartigan 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Vladimir Orszagh
Goal scored by David Vyborny assisted by Jan Hrdina
Penalty to Jeff Hoggan 2 minutes for High Sticking Mark Hartigan
Goal scored by Dennis Wideman assisted by Jamal Mayers AND Dallas Drake
Goal scored by Jan Hrdina assisted by David Vyborny AND Adam Foote
Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for Delaying Game – Puck over Glass(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Rostislav Klesla 2 minutes for High Sticking Scott Young
Penalty to Rostislav Klesla 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Curtis Sanford
Mike Sillinger shootout attempt against Marc Denis with a Wristshot results in a SAVE!
Rick Nash shootout attempt against Curtis Sanford with a Backhand results in a GOAL!
